title: Do I Give Up My Dreams For My Marriage
itunes:title: Do I Give Up My Dreams For My Marriage
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I worked from home as a corporate sales leader for 5 years. In February, I quit my job to do a podcast with 2 of my best girlfriends. Let me give you a little backstory… My husband and I met in college and got married when we were 24 and started a family. We had our first child when we were 25 and our second child on my 27th birthday. I have a degree in Mass Communications and I’ve always wanted a radio job, which is why I want your advice......................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
